name: Wordsearch Infinite Play
description:
Wordsearch Infinite Play is an addictive wordsearch game with a slick user interface and infinite replay value.

You are given a grid of letters and a list of words. Your job is to find the listed words in the grid.

Every puzzle is unique and generated by the game. Each puzzle is different from the last and you never run out.

The dictionary is vast and extensive. It contains just the right balance of easy and challenging words.

Intuitive interface and responsive controls.

User defined grid size for all types of display.

If you're stuck, you can reveal a word, or start a new puzzle at any time.

Expert players can go for a perfect game, you can achieve this by making no mistakes and revealing no words.
